channel.title: Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me! on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me! on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Wait Wait Wayback Machine: December 2003 | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Host Peter Sagal and producer Miles Doornbos challenge a Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me listener with questions about news events from our actual show — but the catch is they’re shows that aired 20 years ago! The Wait Wait Wayback Machine is normally a bonus episode that only Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ supporters can hear and play. Today, we’re making it available for everyone. If you want a chance to play the Wait Wait Wayback Machine, sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.

item.title: WWDTM: Bethenny Frankel | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We’re back at Carnegie Hall, and joined by business mogul, philanthropist, and reality TV royalty Bethenny Frankel! She talks with Peter and panelists Josh Gondelman, Helen Hong, and Alzo Slade about feuds, throwing drinks, and becoming an accidental influencer. Transcript

item.title: Extended cut: Dakota Johnson on her new doc, childhood, and curating a sex museum | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Today we’re giving you a chance to hear an episode that we’d usually share with our Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ supporters! It’s an extended cut of our interview with actor, producer, and activist Dakota Johnson, whose new documentary is The Disappearance of Shere Hite. That’s right — an extended cut. Our celebrity interviews sometimes last much longer than what we’re able to include in our regular show. Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ supporters can hear extended cuts in regular bonus episodes.

item.title: WWDTM: Fred Schneider | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description The B-52’s Fred Schneider joins panelists Eugene Cordero, Luke Burbank, and Paula Poundstone to talk Christmas albums, thrown ham, and singing “Love Shack” at karaoke. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Dakota Johnson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Dakota Johnson, whose new documentary is The Disappearance of Shere Hite, joins panelists Adam Felber, Joyelle Nicole Johnson, and Alonzo Bodden to talk famous families, Fifty Shades of Gray, and more. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: 25th Year Spectacular Part VIII! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Our deep dive into our 25-year history continues with appearances from Jane Curtin, Adam Savage, Hannah Kearney, Muffet McGraw, and more! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Stephen Smith | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description L.L. Bean CEO Stephen Smith joins Hari Kondabolu, Maeve Higgins, and Roy Blount, Jr. on stage in Maine to talk about jelly beans. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: John Stamos | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description John Stamos joins panelists Emmy Blotnick, Skyler Higley, and Tom Bodett to talk about his new memoir, his feud with Tony Danza, and more! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Dr. Rae Wynn-Grant | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Dr. Rae-Wynn Grant is a bear expert and one of the new hosts of Mutual of Omaha’s Wild Kingdom. She joins panelists Adam Burke, Maeve Higgins, and Tom Papa to talk bear attacks, gummy bears, and the strange joy of being squeezed by a boa constrictor. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Bernie Taupin | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week, Bernie Taupin joins guest host Peter Grosz and panelists Alonzo Bodden, Zainab Johnson, and Paula Poundstone to talk about his new memoir Scattershot Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: James Patterson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description James Patterson, the best selling author in the world, joins panelists Alzo Slade, Faith Salie, and Matt Rogers to talk about feuds, fights, outlines, and airports. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: 25th Year Spectacular Part VII! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We’re celebrating 25 years on the air with another dive into our archive. Enjoy interviews with John Goodman, Sam Waterston, Jenny Slate, and a never-before-heard Bluff game! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Solicitor General Elizabeth Prelogar | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Solicitor General Elizabeth Prelogar joins panelists Shantira Jackson, Maz Jobrani, and Roy Blount, Jr, to talk about how being named Miss Idaho prepared her for the Supreme Court Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Bob and Erin Odenkirk | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week, we’re live in LA with comedy legend Bob Odenkirk, and his daughter Erin. They talk their new book of poems, growing up with a dad on TV, and more. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: John Wilson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description John Wilson is the creator of the Emmy-nominated How To With John Wilson, and joins us to talk about being paid in Wite-Out and the best place in New York to meet a referee. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Secretary Clinton | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Secretary Clinton joins us this week to talk about the Clinton Global Initiative’s wild afterparties and whether or not she’s seen Pete Davidson’s tattoo of her. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Martinus Evans | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Martinus Evans is a fitness influencer and the founder of the radically inclusive Slow AF Run Club. He may be proudly slow, but can he answer our questions about something fast AF, the Concorde jet? Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Bob Seger | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Bob Seger is an Ann Arbor legend, a Rock-and-Roll Hall of Famer who also happens to be one of the best selling artists of all time. He made it big with “Night Moves” but can he answer our questions about Knight Moves, or chess strategies? Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Mark Ronson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Mark Ronson is the Grammy and Oscar-winning producer behind the score and soundtrack for Barbie. He joins guest host Negin Farsad and panelists Shantira Jackson, Alzo Slade, and Luke Burbank. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: 25th Year Spectacular Part VI! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Our deep dive into our 25 year history continues with appearances from Brian May, Esperanza Spalding, Cyndi Lauper and more! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: 25th Year Spectacular Part V! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week, we continue our 25 year retrospective with appearances from Donny Osmond, Kristen Bell + Dax Shepard, Ina Garten, and more! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Maggie Smith | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Maggie Smith is one of the world’s most beloved poets. She joins us to talk about her new memoir, how she owes her fame to Starbucks, and why her mom may get banned from the library. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Randall Park | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description For some, being a triple-threat actor/writer/comedian is enough, but not for Randall Park, who decided to add “director” to the list with his debut film Shortcomings. He joins guest host Karen Chee and panelists Zainab Johnson, Tom Bodett and Josh Gondelman. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Damian Lillard | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Damian Lillard joins us in Portland to talk about his storied career, from Dame Time, to rap battles, to owning a Toyota Dealership. He’s assisted by panelists Luke Burbank, Paula Poundstone, and Helen Hong Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Patti LuPone | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Patti LuPone joins panelists Emmy Blotnick, Adam Felber, and Joyelle Nicole Johnson to talk birds, Broadway, and the proper way to swipe a cell phone. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: 25th Year Spectacular Part IV! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week, we’re diving back into the archives for Part IV of our 25th Year Spectacular! We’ve got interviews with George Takei, Martha Stewart, and Mariska Hargitay, plus some time with Barbie director Greta Gerwig! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Aleeza Ben Shalom | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Aleeza Ben Shalom is the star of Netflix’s Jewish Matchmaking, and she joins panelists Adam Burke, Brian Babylon, and Roxanne Roberts to talk about how matchmaking is just like a live-action game of Where’s Waldo Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Karen Allen | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We’re back in Tanglewood and joined by the amazing Karen Allen, who plays the iconic Marion Ravenwood in the Indiana Jones movies. She joins Karen Chee, Roy Blount, Jr. and Negin Farsad to talk spitting in auditions, Tom Selleck, and working with snakes Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: James Marsden | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description James Marsden joins panelists Adam Felber, Karen Chee, and Faith Salie to talk Jury Duty, playing yourself, and what it’s like to be the Baxter in a romcom. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Radhika Jones | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this week’s episode, Vanity Fair editor-in-chief Radhika Jones joins us to talk about Rupert Murdoch, Little House on the Prairie, and the rules of underboob. Plus, Tom Papa, Emmy Blotnick, and Skyler Higley journey into the world of VR. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: The First Quarter Century, pt. III | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We continue our look back at 25 years of shows with Keegan Michael-Key, Regina King, and Susan Orlean Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: John Goodman | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We’re back in New Orleans with the legendary John Goodman! He talks leaving L.A., The Big Lebowski, and being the voice of the St. Louis airport. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Golda Rosheuvel | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Golda Rosheuvel was so captivating as Bridgerton’s Queen Charlotte that Netflix made a show all about her. She joins Luke Burbank, Negin Farsad, and Adam Burke to talk wigs, neck braces, and bodice ripping Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Gabrielle Dennis | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this week’s show, The Big Door Prize’s Gabrielle Dennis joins panelists Paula Poundstone, Alonzo Bodden, and Adam Felber to talk about living to your full potential and the job at Six Flags that everyone else is jealous of. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Ray Romano | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Ray Romano joins panelists Tom Papa, Matt Rogers, and Helen Hong to talk about the secret to marriage, rewatching yourself on TV 15 years later, and having a good poker face. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Brad Paisley | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Brad Paisley joins us live in Nashville to talk about getting recognized for insurance commercials, his skill at writing impromptu jingles for chili, and whether his kids think he’s cool. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Weird Al Yankovic | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Weird Al joins panelists Josh Gondelman, Robby Hoffman, and Tom Bodett to talk about his new (mostly real) biopic, and what he would’ve done if Prince hadn’t turned him down. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Kaila Mullady | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Kaila Mullady started beatboxing in 5th grade to impress a boy, and since then has become a two-time world champion. But, can she answer questions about boxes that get beat, AKA piñatas? Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Everyone & Goodbyes | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Emma and some of her co-hosts say goodbye to the greatest podcast the world has ever seen. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: The First Quarter Century | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We celebrate our 25th anniversary with Jackie Joyner-Kersee, Ed Helms, Bonnie Raitt, and more! Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Michelle Rodriguez | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this week’s episode, action star Michelle Rodriguez joins us to talk about The Fast & The Furious, Dungeons & Dragons, and her personal state slogan for New Jersey. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: David Axelrod | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this week’s episode, we head to Tucson to talk politics with David Axelrod, the former consultant who helped get President Obama elected. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM: Sam Waterston | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this week’s episode, guest host Karen Chee talks with legendary actor Sam Waterston about Law & Order, how to look good in a stovepipe hat, and where to see raccoons doing Shakespeare. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Nick Kroll | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Nick Kroll is a brilliant comedian and one of the minds behind Big Mouth and History of the World, Part II. We Rick Roll Nick Kroll, that is, ask him questions about roles played by actors named Rick. Support NPR by signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: The Wait Wait Anthology: Reality TV Edition | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description On this episode of The Wait Wait Anthology, we bring the drama and dive deep into the world of reality TV. From The Bachelor to The Kardashians, we leave no stone unturned and no suite un-fantasied. Transcript

item.title: Malala Yousafzai on winning the Nobel Peace Prize while in chemistry class | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description At the age of 17, Malala Yousafzai became the youngest person to win the Nobel Peace Prize, and now a documentary she executive produced is nominated for an Oscar. And, if she answers our three questions about puzzles correctly, she’ll win the inaugural Nobel Pieces Prize. A message to listeners: a recent error with Apple Podcasts meant you might not have been able to hear our regular weekend show without signing up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+.

item.title: Best of the First 25 Years | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description We celebrate our 25th anniversary with Mikeael Shiffrin, Leonard Nimoy, Mae Jemison, Stephen Colbert, John Hodgman, and Ozzie Smith. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Spotify Stalking | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Dulcé Sloan and Emma give your playlists the side eye. Plus we ask Pitchfork Editor-in-Chief Puja Patel if you should be self conscious about your bad taste in music. Transcript

item.title: Rosie Perez | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Rosie Perez is a cultural icon, from Do The Right Thing to White Men Can’t Jump to her new role on Showtime’s Your Honor. She’s the best part of any project she’s in, but can she answer our questions about advice columns? Transcript

item.title: Geena Davis | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Geena Davis went from being an Oscar-winning actor to a skilled archer to an activist to an author, and she’s now executive producer of CBS’ Mission Unstoppable. But, can she answer our three questions about blue jeans? Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: The Wait Wait Anthology: Cats Edition | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Introducing The Wait Wait Anthology, a deep dive into the Wait Wait archives hosted by Bill Kurtis Transcript

item.title: Billy Porter | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Billy Porter is an absolute legend. With a career that started in his teens, he’s now 3/4ths of the way to an EGOT. He’s also a style icon, who’s always the most fashionable person in any room he’s in. His new movie is 80 For Brady, but what does he know about the Brady Bunch? Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.

item.title: Natasha Lyonne | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Natasha Lyonne is an actor, writer, and director with one of the most recognizable voices in the world. She stars in the new series Poker Face, so we ask her three questions about getting botox. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Mistaken Identity | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Guest hosts Karen Chee and Josh Gondelman dive head first into alternate universes. Plus we get to the bottom of the Masters tournament mistaken identity kerfuffle. Transcript

item.title: Secretary of State Antony Blinken | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Secretary of State Antony Blinken takes some time out from his busy schedule to tell panelists Dulcé Sloan, Eugene Cordaro, and Tom Bodett about his musical alter ego, ABlinken, and to answer three questions about Matthew Mcconaughey. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: George Saunders | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Celebrated short story author George Saunders joins us to answer three questions about court stories. With panelists Paula Poundstone, Peter Grosz and Emmy Blotnick. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Mariska Hargitay | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Mariska Hargitay, star of Law and Order, SVU, answers three questions about Sweet Valley High, the location depicted in the teen book series. We also revisit our moments with Sean Hayes, Myles Stubblefield, and Mo Amer. Transcript

item.title: The Man Bill-hind the Voice! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Peter sits down with our very own judge and scorekeeper, Bill Kurtis, to learn about the legendary anchorman’s life and career. Transcript

item.title: Best of Not My Job December 2022 | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we revisit our times with Ralph Macchio, Eleanor Holmes Norton, the hosts of the podcast “Ear Hustle” Earlonne Woods and Nigel Poor, and Matt Walsh. Transcript

item.title: Sarah Polley | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Actor and director Sarah Polley plays our game called “Sarah Polley, wanna cracker?” Three questions about parrots. Joining her are panelists Roxanne Roberts, Adam Burke, and Shane O’Neill. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Improv Nerds | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Emma and Vice columnist Alzo Slade try to solve the improv coolness crisis with the help of comedy icon Colin Mochrie. Plus: Emma tries her best to annoy Peter Sagal. Transcript

item.title: Andrew Bird | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Singer-songwriter and world class whistler Andrew Bird plays our game called, “Put Your Lips Together and Blow” Three questions about referees. Joining him are panelists Adam Burke, Tom Papa, and Zainab Johnson. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Gayle King | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Host of CBS Mornings, Gayle King plays our game called, “Gayle King, meet the real Gale Kings” three questions about meteorologists. She is joined by panelists Negin Farsad, Peter Grosz, and Faith Salie. Transcript

item.title: How to Become a Listener Contestant with Peter, Miles, and Sofie | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Have you ever wanted to become a listener contestant on Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me? Host Peter Sagal and producers Miles Doornbos and Sofie Hernandez-Simeonidis discuss how they select which callers make it to the air. Transcript

item.title: Dana Carvey | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week on “Wait Wait…Don’t Tell Me,” we are back with a brand new show from the Studebaker Theatre in Chicago featuring panelists Josh Gondelman, Skyler Higley, and Paula Poundstone. Plus, we quiz comedy legend Dana Carvey on a subject he knows nothing about in our “Not My Job” game. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: WWDTM Best of NMJ Thanksgiving | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Nathan Lane, Puja Patel, Darryl “Cornbread” McCray, and Jeremy O. Harris are featured in this Thanksgiving edition. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Giant Puzzles | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Maeve Higgins and Emma build the world’s largest puzzle. Transcript

item.title: Freddie Johnson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description This week we come to you from the Palace Theatre in Louisville, Kentucky with panelists Paula Poundstone, Adam Burke, and Alzo Slade. Our guest is Freddie Johnson of Buffalo Trace Distillery. Sign up for Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Transcript

item.title: Craig Robinson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Craig Robinson, star of the Office and host of Peacock’s Harlem Globetrotters: Play It Forward, plays our game about Craigslist. Joining him are panelists Tom Papa; Negin Farsad and Brian Babylon. Transcript

item.title: Behind the scenes with Peter and Lillian | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Peter asks Producer and Editor Lillian King why some questions don’t make the show. PLUS: Lillian plays those questions! Transcript

item.title: Amber Ruffin | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Amber Ruffin, host of The Amber Ruffin Show on Peacock and the purple M&M, plays our game called “Roughin’ It” Three questions about camping. Joining in are panelists Karen Chee, Hari Kondabolu and Maz Jobrani. Subscribe to Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org/waitwait. Transcript

item.title: Hasan Minhaj | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Hasan Minhaj, comedian with the new Netflix special “The King’s Jester” and former host of Patriot Act, plays our game about former Patriot Rob Gronkowski. Joining him are panelists Helen Hong, Mo Rocca, and Shane O’Neill. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & The Supernatural | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Mo Rocca considers buying a lighthouse and Emma goes ghost hunting. Transcript

item.title: Dr. Ibram X. Kendi, a real genius | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Dr Ibram X Kendi, author and MacArthur Genius, plays our game about the Genius Bar at Apple Stores. Joining him are panelists Alonzo Bodden, Josh Gondelman and Amy Dickinson. Transcript

item.title: Vivek Murthy | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Vivek Murthy, Surgeon General of the United States, answers three questions about the mysterious and often huge fish, the sturgeon. Also featured are interviews with Jeremy Allen White and Mandy Moore. Transcript

item.title: Behind the scenes with Peter Sagal and Emma Choi | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Peter and Emma sit down with Executive Producer Mike Danforth to answer some questions that you have about the making of Wait Wait. Transcript

item.title: Ralph Macchio | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Ralph Macchio, star of Netflix’s “Cobra Kai” plays our game called “Wax On, Wax Off, Yeowww!” Three questions about hair removal. He is joined by panelists Emmy Blotnick, Alzo Slade and Adam Felber. Transcript

item.title: Julio Torres | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Julio Torres, creator and star of HBO’s Los Espookys, plays our game about The Addams Family called, “Los Ookys.” Joining him are panelists Tom Papa, Dulcé Sloan, and Hari Kondabolu. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Spoons | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Hoja Lopez and Emma get salty with the latest spoon technology and test out new talents nobody asked for. Transcript

item.title: Michael Strahan | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Michael Strahan, NFL legend and Good Morning America host, Michael plays our game called “Strahan? Meet Stray Hams” Three questions about wild hogs. He is joined by panelists Karen Chee, Negin Farsad, and Shane O’Neill. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & A Giant Worm | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Karen Chee and Emma meet a giant worm and learn how to write a spooky children’s book. Transcript

item.title: Mo Amer | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Groundbreaking Palestinian-American comedian Mo Amer, star of the Netflix series Mo, joins us at the Studebaker Theatre in Chicago along with panelists Roy Blount, Jr., Helen Hong and Adam Burke to play a game about things called Les. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Time Capsules | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Emma talks to comedian Hari Kondabolu about time capsules: lost, found, and in the case of Andy Warhol, unintentional. Transcript

item.title: Abbi Jacobson | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Abbi Jacobson, star and producer of the new series “A League of Their Own” joins us along with panelists Paula Poundstone, Faith Salie and Luke Burbank play a game about a different league, The XFL. Subscribe to Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org/waitwait. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Ostrich Escape | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Josh Gondelman joins Emma to outsmart a runaway Ostrich and learn how to prepare for the role of a lifetime. Transcript

item.title: Chris Estrada | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Chris Estrada, comedian and creator of Hulu’s This Fool, plays our game called, “This Fool, Meet April Fools!” He is joined by panelists Skyler Higley, Maeve Higgins and Mo Rocca. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Names | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Peter Grosz joins Emma to spell check your kid’s name and shop for the perfect tattoo. Transcript

item.title: Congresswoman Eleanor Holmes Norton | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Eleanor Holmes Norton, Washington DC’s long-serving Congresswoman, plays our game about DC Comics. She is joined by panelists Roxanne Roberts, Tom Bodett and Alzo Slade. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & School | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Emma gets ready for a new school year by revisiting lessons from Everyone & Their Mom! We learn how rats help each other, how dolphins say hi to their friends, and what to do if you see someone you know but aren’t sure if you should say hi. Transcript

item.title: More Best of Not My Job | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Wait Wait prepares for a return to full time live performances by reliving some of our favorite guests who joined us in front of live audiences. Transcript

item.title: It's an 'Everyone & Their Mom' family reunion! | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Emma throws a family reunion! Uncle Dennis sings Elvis, her mom shares all her tips for avoiding bad luck, and Emma embarrasses her dad and little brother. Grab a plate, it’s a party! Transcript

item.title: Best of Not My Job | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Steve Buscemi, Lars Ulrich, Aidy Bryant, Alan Cummings, and Jeff Daniels play Not My Job. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Asparagus | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Marie Faustin and Emma learn the future from a bunch of asparagus and meet a mystery person while Emma’s mom stops by with a helpful tip. Transcript

item.title: Robin Thede | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Robin Thede, creator of A Black Lady Sketch Show, plays our game about Bob Ross, “A White Dude Painting Show,” along with guest host Negin Farsad and panelists Adam Burke, Amy Dickinson and Hari Kondabolu. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Socks | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Alzo Slade and Emma seek legal counsel from ‘The People’s Court’ Judge Marilyn Milian and pass judgment on an unfair pair of socks and a bad bowl of grits. Transcript

item.title: Jeremy Allen White | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Jeremy Allen White, star of Hulu’s The Bear plays our game called “Please Look After This Bear” three questions about Paddington Bear. He is joined by guest host Tom Papa and panelists Helen Hong, Bobcat Goldthwait, and Faith Salie. Transcript

item.title: Everyone & Van Gogh | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Comedian Vinny Thomas and Emma discover Van Gogh’s ghost and get inspired by an artist with a selfie stick. Transcript

item.title: Nathan Lane | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!

item.title: Everyone & Their Mom | Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
item.description: Podcast Description Introducing Everyone & Their Mom from Wait Wait…Don’t Tell Me! Every week, there’s an odd or funny story that everyone & their mom seems to be talking about. On this new show from your friends at Wait Wait… Don’t Tell Me!, host Emma Choi takes that story and uses it as an excuse to talk to culture makers, Wait Wait panelists, and hilarious new comedians. New episodes every Wednesday, starting February 23rd.
